description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: There are properties in class `Spryker\Zed\PropelReplicationCache\Business\PropelReplicationCacheFacade` which violates rule "A facade must not have properties. It must also not contain any instantiations, only delegation."

Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\PropelReplicationCache\Business\PropelReplicationCacheFacade::getInstance()()` contains a `if` statement which violates the rule "A Facade must not contain logic and only delegate."

Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\PropelReplicationCache\Business\PropelReplicationCacheFacade::getInstance()()` uses `new` to instantiate an object which violates rule "No instantiations with 'new'"

Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\PropelReplicationCache\Business\PropelReplicationCacheFacade::getInstance()()` is using an invalid return type `self` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
